name: Ankha Game
description:
Ankha was exploring the desert that exists just beyond her town's walls when a sandstorm picked up, thinking fast she ducked inside a walled off Oasis to wait it out, the sandstorm has now passed and she seeks to return to town.

How to Play:
You control Ankha after the sandstorm has subsided, getting back to town is pretty easy and there's no need to rush nor worry about any dangers for within the walls of this Oasis you are safe, naturally take your time to take in the sights, sounds(or lack there of) and such and interact with things along your way, the exit is within arm's reach.

Controls:
> W/A/S/D keys to move
> Space bar to interact/ progress through interactions

Furthermore:
A week ago I got the inspiration to do some Ankha sprites and so with this sprite sheet in my lap I figured I'd expand it into a game, it's in unfamiliar territory for me from a developer stand point so from a learning and experimenting perspective I think it turned out pretty well and I actually got to use those sprites I wanted to, and they came out really cute in my opinion.
